short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays motivational quotes and the current date and time in your browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Quote-Clock:
Transform your new tab into a source of daily inspiration and mindfulness. With Quote-Clock, every new tab brings fresh motivation, fostering a new mindset for a new you.

Key Features:
- Dynamic Motivational Quotes: Receive an uplifting quote each time you open a new tab. Quotes refresh every few seconds, providing continuous inspiration throughout your day.

- Current Date and Time Display: Stay on schedule with a clear presentation of the current date and time, seamlessly integrated into your new tab.

- Soothing Colorful Backgrounds: Experience a visually pleasing environment with gradient backgrounds that update with new colors every few seconds, designed to calm and inspire, enhancing your browsing experience.

Why Choose Quote-Clock?
Elevate your daily routine with a blend of inspiration and functionality. Quote-Clock not only keeps you informed but also encourages a positive mindset, making each new tab a moment of motivation.

Transform your browsing experience with Quote-Clock where every new tab brings inspiration.
Changing lives one tab at a time ♥️


To use Quote Clock, follow these simple steps:
1. Install the Extension:
- Click the "Add to Chrome" button on the Quote-Clock extension page in the Chrome Web Store.
- Confirm the installation when prompted.

2. Experience the Transformation:
- Open a new tab in your Chrome browser.
- Enjoy the refreshed appearance of your new tab, featuring dynamic motivational quotes, the current date and time, and soothing colorful backgrounds.

No additional setup is required. Once installed, Quote-Clock automatically enhances your new tab experience, providing continuous inspiration and mindfulness throughout your day. Enjoy!


⭐️ Please rate and share the Quote-Clock extension based on your experience, would love to read your reviews.
